title: Bella Hadid and The Weeknd 'back together' and 'very happy' after 'working on their relationship'
text:

Bella Hadid and The Weeknd have reportedly rekindled their romance.

The model, 23, and singer, 29, real name Abel Tesfaye, are said to be back on track and "very happy" after "working on their relationship" after splitting in August.

The couple are once again an item, according to E!, as Abel attended the catwalk queen's 23rd birthday bash amongst her friends and family at New York's L'Avenue restaurant earlier this week.

A source told the publication: "He was with her the entire night and they left together to go back to the apartment they both shared.

"You could tell that they were definitely in love and they both looked very happy being around each other."

The source added: "They are in a better place right now but are trying to keep things on the down-low. They both want to be more private about it this time around."

It is reported that the former flames got back in touch over recent weeks as a result of “working on their relationship”.

Mirror Online has contacted Bella and The Weeknd's representatives for comment.

in August the pair were said to have gone their separate ways after their careers kept them apart for too long.

It was reported the stars felt they weren't able to see each other enough, and that being kept apart so much began to cause tension between them.

(Image: Getty Images for People.com)

(Image: REUTERS/Danny Moloshok)

A source told E! News : "They are in different places right now, physically and mentally.

"Bella is prepping for her fashion week commitments and Abel is working on his music and his upcoming acting debut."

It's was also said there had been a lot of friction between them lately.

The source added: "They have been arguing a lot recently. They hope to get back together at one point but for now are focusing on themselves and their projects."

(Image: Getty)

Bella and The Weeknd first started dating after they met at Coachella in 2015, but they split later that same year.

He later started dating singer Selena Gomez , but they parted ways in October 2017 and she reunited with her ex Justin Bieber for a short-lived second romance.

The Weeknd and Bella then got back together in July 2018 before then splitting in August 2019.
